name: Eagle Userbot
description: A Telegram based Smooth Userbot to manage your Telegram account effectively based on Pyrogram Library.

SESSION.description: Get this value by running eaglesession.py or use eagle Replit Tool.

MONGO_URI.description: This is for the database account, you can obtain it from mongodb.com.

HEROKU_API.description: Your heroku api key if using heroku.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku app name if using heroku.

LOG_CHAT.description: A private group ID to store your logs. Add Rose Bot to get it.
